name: Smart Investment Calculator (For businesses)
author: Hayat Developers | Smart Investment Calculator - Made for Businesses

sections.description:
Whether you’re considering getting started with investing or you’re already a seasoned investor, this investment calculator can help you or your web visitors figure out how to meet your goals. It can show how your initial investment, frequency of contributions and risk tolerance can all affect how your money grows.

Plugin Usage Data

This plugin may collect non-sensitive usage data to help us improve the usual bugs and design conflicts to provide you best experience ever.

Features

  1. Fully Responsive
  2. Set Calculator Theme Color
  3. Translate / Edit Labels
  4. Support All Currencies
  5. Change Chart Colors
  6. Set Default Input Values
  7. Show / Hide Inputs
  8. Admin Backend settings

Frequency of Contributions

  1. Annually
  2. Semi-Annually
  3. Monthly
  4. Weekly
  5. Bi-Weekly
sections.installation:
Installation of the plugin is really simple.

  1. Install using one of these options:
    • Install directly from WordPress Admin panel: go to Plugins -> Add New -> Search for “Smart Investment Calculator”, and click the Install button.
    • Download the ZIP manually from WordPress’ plugins repository, and upload it through WordPress Admin panel: go to Plugins -> Add New -> Upload Plugin, browse to the downloaded Zip and upload it.
    • Download the ZIP, extract it and manually upload the extracted folder through FTP to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it!
sections.faq:
Can I change currency of the calculator?

Yes, you can use any currency in the calculator. You can change currency setting from admin menu.

Can I update design according to my web theme?

We provide exclusive options to change look of the calculator by changing colors , shadow and labels that best fir your requirements.

short_description: Investment Calculator for professionals & businesses with contribution frequency of Annually, Semi-Annually, Monthly, Weekly & Bi-Weekly.

screenshots.caption: Customize design (Theme & Colors) from settings according to your web theme.
Customize Design, change currency, change chart colors from one dashboard.
Edit / Translate labels, set default values , show/ hide fixed fields according to your needs.
Copy short code for the calculator & paste the short code into posts / pages.
